search_parameters.q: Middle Schools and Math Groups: Parents' Involvement in Children's Placement. Useem, Elizabeth L. Sociology of Education

search_information.query_displayed: Middle Schools and Math Groups: Parents' Involvement in Children's Placement. Useem, Elizabeth L. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Middle schools and math groups: Parents' involvement in children's placement
organic_results.snippet: Interviews with a random sample of 86 mothers in two suburban communities revealed that the high correlation between parents' education levels and their children's placement in the mathematics tracking system as they enter middle and junior high school can be explained, in part, by the propensity of college-educated parents to be knowledgeable about their children's placement, to be integrated into school affairs and parental information networks, to intervene in educational decisions that school personnel make for their children, and to …

publication_info.summary: EL Useem - Sociology of education, 1992 - JSTOR
